price: 72. Est-ce vous qui avez créé l’arbre (qui permet de l’allumer) ou est-ce Nous le Créateur ?
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنشَأۡتُمۡ شَجَرَتَهَآ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنشِـُٔونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: a-antum anshatum shajaratahā am naḥnu al-munshiūna
